about_the_game:
DinoDash is a high-speed racing game set in a futuristic world where dinosaurs have been reborn as precious minerals and gemstones. The dinosaurs, who survived an extinction event, compete on dangerous tracks to quench their adrenaline thirst. With multiple maps, DinoDash offers a unique and challenging experience for players of all skill levels.
In this intense, low-poly racing game, you'll have the opportunity to compete against other players in both single-player and multiplayer modes from across the globe. Players will have the ability to personalize their dinosaur racer with an array of cosmetic options, including skins, hover cars, and various other accessories. As you progress through the game, you'll have the chance to unlock new cosmetic items to make your racer stand out on the track.
The controls in DinoDash are straightforward, allowing players to quickly get a feel for the game. The fast-paced, action-packed gameplay and the low-poly visual style combine to create an engaging and thrilling racing experience. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the genre, DinoDash offers an entertaining and challenging racing experience that will keep you coming back for more.
The constant development of new cosmetic options, tracks designs, and daily challenges ensures that there is always something new to discover and enjoy in DinoDash. Join the intense racing action and see if you have what it takes to become the champion of this high-speed, futuristic world.

name: DinoDash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: i7 CPU or greater
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 550 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i9 CPU
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: DinoDash is an action packed racing game set in a futuristic world where dinosaurs have been reborn as precious gemstones. After surviving extinction they race at high speeds on dangerous tracks to fill their adrenaline. Join this intense experience and see if you can become the DinoDash champion!
